mapper.sql: SELECT `id` id, `mchn` mchn, `registered_seq_no` registeredSeqNo, `platform_username` platformUsername, `login_username` loginUsername, `age` age, `acc_name` accName, `cert_type` certType, `cert_no` certNo, `sex` sex, `mobile` mobile, `address` address, `user_properties` userProperties, `registration_date` registrationDate, `third_party_payment_id` thirdPartyPaymentId, `action_type` actionType, `remark` remark, `status` status From `t_gq_fss_sftp_account_file` t
